article: A little girl lived in a simple and poor house on a hill.Usually she  _  play in the small garden.She could see over the garden fence and across the valley a wonderful house with shining golden windows high on another hill.  _  she loved her parents and her family, she desired to live in such a house and  _  all day about how wonderful and exciting  _  must feel to live there.
